about_the_game:
"301 Warriors" - Ode to Devouring Corpses: The Era of Ants

This is an action role-playing game where players assume the role of an exiled "Godslayer," unraveling terrifying truths in a spiral of reincarnation and resurrection: the so-called predators are merely another plate of insects on the dining tables of ancient deities.

When humanity's proud civilization is crushed into "fodder," when the heads of so-called heroes become trophies adorning predators' gates, and when you are forced into the food chain—will you choose to be digested, or will you bite back at the gods' throats as they chew?

Game Controls Guide:

Movement: Use the W, A, S, D keys on the keyboard to control character movement.

Jump: Press the Spacebar to make the character jump.

Exit Game: Press the ESC key at the top-left corner of the keyboard to exit.

Keyboard Skills:

Q Key: Release an area freeze skill to immobilize surrounding enemies.

E Key: Restore a portion of the character's HP.

R Key: Repel enemies with an effect similar to billiard ball collisions.

Mouse Controls:

Right-click: Enhances character movement elegance and helps escape enemy encirclement.

Game Tip:

The controls are simple and beginner-friendly. If the initial difficulty feels challenging, defeat minor enemies that drop runes to boost your character's health and attack power.
detailed_description:
"301 Warriors" - Ode to Devouring Corpses: The Era of Ants

This is an action role-playing game where players assume the role of an exiled "Godslayer," unraveling terrifying truths in a spiral of reincarnation and resurrection: the so-called predators are merely another plate of insects on the dining tables of ancient deities.

When humanity's proud civilization is crushed into "fodder," when the heads of so-called heroes become trophies adorning predators' gates, and when you are forced into the food chain—will you choose to be digested, or will you bite back at the gods' throats as they chew?

Game Controls Guide:

Movement: Use the W, A, S, D keys on the keyboard to control character movement.

Jump: Press the Spacebar to make the character jump.

Exit Game: Press the ESC key at the top-left corner of the keyboard to exit.

Keyboard Skills:

Q Key: Release an area freeze skill to immobilize surrounding enemies.

E Key: Restore a portion of the character's HP.

R Key: Repel enemies with an effect similar to billiard ball collisions.

Mouse Controls:

Right-click: Enhances character movement elegance and helps escape enemy encirclement.

Game Tip:

The controls are simple and beginner-friendly. If the initial difficulty feels challenging, defeat minor enemies that drop runes to boost your character's health and attack power.
name: 301 Warriors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win11
  • Processor: Inter Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win11
  • Processor: inter Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: This is an action casual game that is not difficult to operate and is also recommended to female players. The game expresses the theme of "I want to go home".
supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
